title: Video: Spring Offensive – Every Coin (Berlin Sessions)
content:
Oxford quintet Spring Offensive have been off touring Europe for the last couple of weeks, and for anyone back home missing the band’s formidable live presence, the lovely people over at Berlin Sessions have filmed a special acoustic version of the mighty Every Coin, from 2010’s Pull Us Apart, in the back of a fast food joint. Who needs a drumkit when you’ve got a suitcase eh?

Further tour dates, as well as a bunch of other useful stuff, can be found on the Spring Offensive website. For all that breaking Spring Offensive news (including close shaves with the German narcotics division), head to the band’s Tumblr.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d3c
